Title: Provides a closing date for big game season in certain counties
Summary: Provides a closing date for big game season to be seven days after special late muzzle-loader season in the counties of Madison, Onondaga and Oneida.
LawCode: Amd ยง11-0907, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to providing a closing date for big game season in certain counties
